mapper.select: select m.id id , m.login_name loginName, m.sex sex, m.contact_name contactName, m.contact_phone contactPhone, m.company company, m.area_province provinceid, m.area_city cityid, m.area_city cityids, m.area_zone zoneid, m.area_zone zoneids, m.address address, m.email email from m_member_info m left join m_area_province p on m.area_province = p.code left join m_area_city c on m.area_city = c.code left join m_area_zone z on m.area_zone = z.code left join m_select_info s on m.sex = s.select_key where s.type_code = 'sex' and m.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update m_member_info set sex = #{sex} , contact_name = #{contactName} , contact_phone = #{contactPhone} , company=#{company} , area_province = #{provinceid}, area_city = #{cityid} , area_zone = #{zoneid} , address = #{address} , email = #{email} , modified_id = #{loginName} , modified_time = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select password from m_member_info where id = #{id}
select contact_phone from m_member_info where id = #{id}
mapper.update: update m_member_info set password = #{password} where id = #{id}
update m_member_info set contact_phone = #{contactPhone} where id = #{id}
